project_description: Personal project. Users can book trips using the application

project_details.description: Full stack application using Node.js, MongoDb. Users can view all available trips and successfully book a trip. Payment feature is developed using stripe payments.

project_description: Translate text to multiple available languages.

project_details.description: Langauge translator uses open-source Meta NLLB (Natural Langugage Left Behind) API to translate the input text to the desired language.
